meaning: Savitri vidya extols the Divine Mother as the wealth and prosperity (Lakshmi) of the (rājya).
commentary:
Wealth and prosperity are the foundations of every empire. Chanakya is that great personality who has brought out the rules and regulations (neeti) for the kingdom in a manner that is ideal for Kali yuga. He has compiled the knowledge that is contained in the Vedas and Upanishads under the title Artha-shastra. This treatise details the duties of a king, ministers, the soldiers, the duties and rights of the citizens and so on.

To us, our body is the kingdom within which She resides as Lakshmi in the intellect (buddhi). Lakshmi here means Jnana sampada (wealth of knowledge).
